wikipedia_page.main: Peter Barlow (born 9 January 1950) is an English former football player and manager who played as a forward in the Football League for Colchester United, Workington and Hartlepool United. He was also player-manager at Coggeshall Town, assisted by his father Bert who was also a professional footballer.
